sources.title: Senior (The Convent) | Full Movie | Thai Horror Drama In English
sources.description:
The Convent (AKA Senior) - A pair of detective buddies from two different dimensions team up to solve a murder that took place 50 years ago. One of them is Adhiti, a 12th grade high school student of a convent boarding school. She has a secret sensory talent: she can smell the spirits of the dead. The other detective is a ghost, a spirit of a senior student of the school who passed away years ago.
2015.  Stars: Sa-Ard Piempongsan, Kara Polasit, Pongsakorn Tosuwann

metadata.Plot: A group of college students break into an abandoned convent and become possessed by demonic spirits.
metadata.Actors: Joanna Canton, Richard Trapp, Dax Miller
